title: Modest US Hiring to Cap a Sluggish Year for the Job Market
description: US job gains probably remained modest in December, wrapping up one of the weakest years for employment growth since 2009.
content: US job gains probably remained modest in December, wrapping up one of the weakest years for employment growth since 2009.
